content:
If I upgrade to 5.3 or later the web client keeps reloading itself.
Downgrade to 5.2 fixes the issue.

Seems to be something between my reverse proxy and some new config with Zulip 5.3+.
Any idea what change can be causing the issue here?
@Ricardo Duarte huh, interesting. What makes you think it has to do with a reverse proxy?
I think we did upgrade the underlying Electron in that release, and that seems like the most plausible change that might have caused this behavior.
